find[source]

find(item, List, match_stem=False)

Find an item in a List

find('abc', ['ijk','asdfs','dfsabcdsf','lmnop']) 'dgsabcdsf' find('file1', ['/tmp/file0.jpg', '/tmp/file0.png', '/tmp/file1.jpg', '/tmp/file1.png', '/tmp/file2.jpg', '/tmp/file2.png']) ['/tmp/file1.jpg', '/tmp/file1.png']
